<p>I am Professor of Information Management at the Berlin School of Library and Information Science at Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, and Scientific Consultant for Open Science at the Helmholtz Association’s Open Science Office.</p>

<p>On this website, you will find information about my work and research.</p>

<h2>Blogging</h2>

<p>While not always as frequently as I’d like, I blog about innovations in scholarly communication at <i class="bi bi-wordpress"></i> <a href="https://wisspub.net" target="_blank" rel="noopener">wisspub.net</a>.</p>

<p>At Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, our Research Group Information Management hosts a virtual research lab, where we regularly share updates on our projects and research: <i class="bi bi-rss"></i> <a href="https://infomgnt.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener">infomgnt.org</a></p>

<h2>Contact</h2>

<p>The best way to reach me is by email: <a href="mailto:heinz.pampel@hu-berlin.de">heinz.pampel\@hu-berlin.de</a></p>

```{=html}
<script>
/**
 * Lightweight client-side RSS/Atom feed reader for infomgnt.org
 * - Primary: fetch XML directly from the source
 * - Fallback: rss2json proxy (when CORS blocks XML)
 * - Renders as Bootstrap cards with a left-aligned thumbnail (if available)
 */
(function () {
  var root = document.getElementById('infomgnt-feed-items');
  var FEED_PRIMARY = 'https://infomgnt.org/index.xml';
  var FEED_FALLBACK_JSON = 'https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=' + encodeURIComponent(FEED_PRIMARY);

  /* ---- Utilities ---- */

  // Safely strip HTML to plain text for titles/descriptions
  function stripHtml(html) {
    var div = document.createElement('div');
    div.innerHTML = html || '';
    return (div.textContent || div.innerText || '').trim();
  }

  // Parse to Date, with a safe fallback
  function asDate(d) { try { return new Date(d); } catch (e) { return new Date(); } }

  // German locale date, short month, 2-digit day
  function fmtDate(d) { return d.toLocaleDateString('de-DE', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: '2-digit' }); }

  // Extract the first <img src="..."> from an HTML string
  function firstImgFromHTML(html) {
    try {
      var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(html || '', 'text/html');
      var img = doc.querySelector('img[src]');
      return img ? img.getAttribute('src') : '';
    } catch(e) { return ''; }
  }

  // Try common RSS/Atom places for images: media:thumbnail, media:content, enclosure, or first <img> in description/content
  function getImageFromXMLNode(n) {
    var mediaThumb = n.querySelector('media\\:thumbnail, thumbnail');
    if (mediaThumb && mediaThumb.getAttribute('url')) return mediaThumb.getAttribute('url');

    var mediaContent = n.querySelector('media\\:content[medium="image"], media\\:content[url]');
    if (mediaContent && mediaContent.getAttribute('url')) return mediaContent.getAttribute('url');

    var enclosure = n.querySelector('enclosure[url][type^="image/"]');
    if (enclosure) return enclosure.getAttribute('url');

    var descNode = n.querySelector('content\\:encoded, description, summary, content');
    return firstImgFromHTML((descNode && descNode.textContent) || '');
  }

  /* ---- Rendering ---- */

  // Create a Bootstrap card with a small left thumbnail
  function makeCard(item) {
    var col = document.createElement('div');
    col.className = 'col';

    var card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'card h-100 shadow-sm';

    var body = document.createElement('div');
    body.className = 'card-body d-flex align-items-start';

    // Thumbnail (optional)
    if (item.image) {
      var img = document.createElement('img');
      img.className = 'feed-thumb me-3 rounded';
      img.loading = 'lazy';
      img.decoding = 'async';
      img.src = item.image;
      img.alt = stripHtml(item.title || 'Thumbnail');
      body.appendChild(img);
    }

    // Text content wrapper
    var content = document.createElement('div');
    content.className = 'flex-grow-1';

    var h = document.createElement('h4');
    h.className = 'card-title h6 mb-1';

    var a = document.createElement('a');
    a.href = item.link || '#';
    a.target = '_blank';
    a.rel = 'noopener';
    a.className = 'stretched-link text-decoration-none';
    a.appendChild(document.createTextNode(stripHtml(item.title || 'Untitled')));
    h.appendChild(a);

    var time = document.createElement('div');
    time.className = 'small text-muted mb-1';
    if (item.date) time.appendChild(document.createTextNode(fmtDate(asDate(item.date))));

    var p = document.createElement('p');
    p.className = 'card-text mb-0 small';
    var desc = stripHtml(item.description || '').slice(0, 140);
    if (desc) p.appendChild(document.createTextNode(desc + '…'));

    content.appendChild(h);
    if (item.date) content.appendChild(time);
    if (desc) content.appendChild(p);

    body.appendChild(content);
    card.appendChild(body);
    col.appendChild(card);
    return col;
  }

  function render(items) {
    root.innerHTML = '';
    if (!items || !items.length) {
      var col = document.createElement('div');
      col.className = 'col';
      col.innerHTML = '<div class="alert alert-warning mb-0">No entries found.</div>';
      root.appendChild(col);
      return;
    }
    items.forEach(function (it) { root.appendChild(makeCard(it)); });
  }

  /* ---- Fetchers ---- */

  // Fetch and parse RSS/Atom XML
  function fetchXML(url) {
    return fetch(url, { headers: { 'Accept': 'application/rss+xml, application/atom+xml, application/xml;q=0.9, text/xml;q=0.8' } })
      .then(function (res) { if (!res.ok) throw new Error('HTTP ' + res.status); return res.text(); })
      .then(function (txt) {
        var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(txt, 'application/xml');
        if (doc.querySelector('parsererror')) throw new Error('XML parse error');
        var nodes = Array.prototype.slice.call(doc.querySelectorAll('item, entry')).slice(0, 8);
        return nodes.map(function (n) {
          var isAtom = n.tagName.toLowerCase() === 'entry';
          var t = (n.querySelector('title') || {}).textContent || '';
          var linkEl = isAtom ? (n.querySelector('link[rel="alternate"]') || n.querySelector('link')) : n.querySelector('link');
          var l = isAtom ? ((linkEl && linkEl.getAttribute('href')) || '') : ((linkEl && linkEl.textContent) || '');
          var dNode = isAtom ? (n.querySelector('updated') || n.querySelector('published')) : n.querySelector('pubDate');
          var d = (dNode && dNode.textContent) || '';
          var descNode = n.querySelector('content\\:encoded, description, summary, content');
          var desc = (descNode && descNode.textContent) || '';
          var image = getImageFromXMLNode(n);
          return { title: t, link: l, date: d, description: desc, image: image };
        });
      });
  }

  // Fallback via rss2json (when XML is blocked by CORS)
  function fetchJSON(url) {
    return fetch(url)
      .then(function (res) { if (!res.ok) throw new Error('HTTP ' + res.status); return res.json(); })
      .then(function (data) {
        return (data.items || []).slice(0, 8).map(function (i) {
          var image =
            i.thumbnail ||
            (i.enclosure && /^image\//.test(i.enclosure.type || '') && i.enclosure.link) ||
            firstImgFromHTML(i.content || i.description || i.summary || '');
          return {
            title: i.title,
            link: i.link,
            date: i.pubDate || i.updated,
            description: i.description || i.content || i.summary,
            image: image
          };
        });
      });
  }

  /* ---- Bootstrap: try XML, then JSON fallback ---- */
  fetchXML(FEED_PRIMARY).then(render).catch(function (e1) {
    fetchJSON(FEED_FALLBACK_JSON).then(render).catch(function (e2) {
      console.error('Feed error', e1, e2);
      root.innerHTML = '<div class="col"><div class="alert alert-danger mb-0">The feed could not be loaded. <a class="alert-link" href="https://infomgnt.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Go to infomgnt.org</a></div></div>';
    });
  });
})();
</script>
```
